ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Iksar and Smithing Questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve seen Iksar at the gates of Freeport and the gate of Felwithe so they can get into at least those 2 cities. Ulgarth 13th level enchanter Fennin Ro ...
ygData.messageBody:
I've seen Iksar at the gates of Freeport and the gate of Felwithe so they
can get into at least those 2 cities.

Ulgarth
13th level enchanter
Fennin Ro


----- Original Message -----
From: "(Arakine)" <vtemplarv@...>
To: "'(EQ Enchanters)'" <eqenchanters@egroups.com>; "'(EQ-Druids)'"
<EQ-Druids@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 07, 2000 1:25 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Iksar and Smithing Questions...


> I recently made an Iksar warrior and had a few questions for those of you
> out there that have Iksar alternates/primary toons or are good friends
with
> someone that plays an Iksar.
>
> Can an Iksar become non-kos to good or evil races on Antonica or Faydwer?
>
